name: @jhomen368/overseerr-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Overseerr - enables AI assistants to search, request, and manage media through your Overseerr instance
author: jhomen368

tools.name: search_media
tools.description: Search for movies, TV shows, or people with optional batch dedupe mode for checking multiple titles at once

tools.name: request_media
tools.description: Request movies or TV shows with automatic validation and multi-season confirmation

tools.name: manage_media_requests
tools.description: Manage media requests - list, approve, decline, delete, or get request details

tools.name: get_media_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about movies or TV shows with flexible detail levels
